From the Desk of Justia

Google Will Update Its Core Web Vitals Metrics on March 12

Google has officially announced that as of March 12, 2024, the Interaction to Next Paint (INP) metric will replace First Input Delay (FID) as a Core Web Vital.

Justia Team | February 2, 2024

Justia Webinars: Effective Time Management for Attorneys

There are only 24 hours in a day, but sometimes it may feel like you need 48 hours a day just to manage all your cases and law firm business. Even as a busy attorney, you don’t need to compromise! Learn effective time management with Chris Earley and take back those precious hours of your day.

Justia Team | February 13, 2024

Google’s Bard AI Makes Its Official Transition to Gemini

Google updated its AI chatbot, Bard, to Gemini (its latest and most advanced AI model), offering its own Android app and introducing a paid version named Gemini Advanced.

Justia Team | February 8, 2024

Tip of the Month

Make Sure Your Website Is Ready for This CWV Update

Is your website ready for the upcoming Core Web Vitals update? Google has officially announced that as of March 12, 2024, the Interaction to Next Paint (INP) metric will replace First Input Delay (FID) as a Core Web Vital. If you are a Justia website client, you are all set! We closely follow these announcements and update our sites accordingly, but if you do not have a Justia website, we recommend checking with your web provider. Consider exploring Justia Elevate for the best in tech!

Sometimes, it is not enough just to have a business card and a website to tell people, “I am here.” In a competitive legal landscape filled with people who have business cards and websites, you need more to draw the eyes of potential clientele and build your law firm. You need charisma.

TikTok has released a new guide with actionable tips and recommendations to enhance the effectiveness of ad campaigns on its platform. Read this post to uncover strategies for refining ad campaigns and optimizing bidding techniques.

Justia Legal Resources: Elder Law Center

Aging Americans deserve to enjoy comfortable and dignified lives. However, they may face certain risks or challenges involving their age and declining health. The Elder Law Center at Justia sheds more light on these issues.

Chris Skelton | February 13, 2024

Justia CLE & Webinars: Understanding Loan Transactions for the Non-Finance Attorney

As a lawyer, you may come across loan transactions even if you are not a finance attorney. What do you need to do, and what do all these documents in a loan document package even mean? Now is the time to demystify it all so you can elevate your law firm practice and ensure quality legal representation for all your clients!

Justia Team | February 22, 2024

Justia Legal Resources: Workers’ Compensation Law Center

Despite workplace safety laws, accidents happen on the job all too often. These generally trigger a right to medical, wage, and other benefits. The Workers’ Compensation Law Center at Justia describes the rules governing these programs.

Chris Skelton | January 30, 2024
